original_text: You have been cruel to poor people for no reason. Your clothes have their blood on them! They had not robbed you, but you still killed them. You have done all these bad things, but still you say, You have been cruel to poor people for no reason. Your clothes have their blood on them! They had not robbed you, but you still killed them. You have done all these bad things, but still you say, You have been cruel to poor people for no reason. Your clothes have their blood on them! They had not robbed you, but you still killed them. You have done all these bad things, but still you say, You have been cruel to poor people for no reason. Your clothes have their blood on them! They had not robbed you, but you still killed them. You have done all these bad things, but still you say, You have been cruel to poor people for no reason. Your clothes have their blood on them! They had not robbed you, but you still killed them. You have done all these bad things, but still you say, You have been cruel to poor people for no reason.
korean_text: 또 네 옷단에는 죄 없는 가난한 자를 죽인 피가 묻었나니 그들이 담 구멍을 뚫었기 때문이 아니라 오직 이 모든 일 때문이니라

sentences.original_text: You have been cruel to poor people
Your clothes have their blood on them
You have done all these bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 이 모든 나쁜 일들을 했다
